	We are looking for a highly motivated and results-driven Sales Executive to help us expand our reach and achieve our growth targets.
	As a Sales Executive, you will be on the front lines, responsible for driving the growth of our product portfolio. This includes deposit mobilization, loan origination, and promoting other financial services.
	You will be a key representative of the bank, building lasting relationships and ensuring customer satisfaction within your designated market.


Key Responsibilities


	Aggressively market and sell the bank&rsquo;s various products, including savings accounts, fixed deposits, current accounts, and loan products.

	Ensure compliance with all bank policies, procedures, and regulatory requirements during sales and onboarding processes.

	Minimum of 2 Years in Business Administration, Marketing, Finance, or a related field.
	2-3 years of proven, successful experience in a sales role, preferably within a microfinance bank, cooperative society, commercial bank, or other financial institution.
	Demonstrable track record of meeting and exceeding challenging sales targets.
	Strong knowledge of banking products and services, particularly those relevant to the cooperative/microfinance sector.

	Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.
	A high degree of professionalism, integrity, and ethical conduct.
	Ability to work independently, manage time effectively, and thrive in a target-driven environment.
	Strong customer focus and relationship-building skills.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).


Salary
N150,000 per month.&nbsp;

Method of Application&nbsp;

Sales Executive Job at Espritsor Enterprises




        
    

        
        Espritsor - Our client, PAYFAX is committed to financial inclusion and empowering our members and customers through innovative, accessible, and ethical financial services.

They are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Executive
Job Location: Utako, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for a highly motivated and results-driven Sales Executive to help us expand our reach and achieve our growth targets.
	As a Sales Executive, you will be on the front lines, responsible for driving the growth of our product portfolio. This includes deposit mobilization, loan origination, and promoting other financial services.
	You will be a key representative of the bank, building lasting relationships and ensuring customer satisfaction within your designated market.


Key Responsibilities


	Aggressively market and sell the bank’s various products, including savings accounts, fixed deposits, current accounts, and loan products.
	Identify and prospect new customers (individuals, SMEs, and groups) to grow the bank's customer base and deposit volume.
	Conduct market research to understand customer needs and competitor offerings, providing feedback to management.
	Manage and maintain a portfolio of existing customers, ensuring high retention rates and cross-selling opportunities.
	Achieve and exceed monthly, quarterly, and annual sales targets and Key Performance Indicators (KPIs).
	Prepare and submit regular sales reports, including pipeline and performance analyses.
	Ensure compliance with all bank policies, procedures, and regulatory requirements during sales and onboarding processes.


Qualifications & Experience


	Minimum of 2 Years in Business Administration, Marketing, Finance, or a related field.
	2-3 years of proven, successful experience in a sales role, preferably within a microfinance bank, cooperative society, commercial bank, or other financial institution.
	Demonstrable track record of meeting and exceeding challenging sales targets.
	Strong knowledge of banking products and services, particularly those relevant to the cooperative/microfinance sector.


Skills & Competencies


	Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.
	A high degree of professionalism, integrity, and ethical conduct.
	Ability to work independently, manage time effectively, and thrive in a target-driven environment.
	Strong customer focus and relationship-building skills.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).


Salary
N150,000 per month. 

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a detailed Cover Letter to: espritsorng@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

We provide individuals and SMEs with credit, high yield investment products, payment solutions and personal financial management tools.We are guided by a strong set of values that acts as our moral compass; including a deep commitment to stakeholder satisfaction. We always strive to make a positive social impact through our work and the way we run.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Executive
Job Location: Ikoyi, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a Business Development Executive to drive growth through strategic marketing, client acquisition, and customer relationship management, with a focus on deposit mobilization, asset creation, and expanding our customer base.


Key Responsibilities


	Drive Client Acquisition: Develop and implement strategies to acquire new clients and grow the customer base.
	Generate Deposits: Develop and execute strategies to attract and retain deposits from existing and new clients.
	Build Strong Client Relationships: Cultivate long-term relationships with clients by providing personalized financial advice, excellent customer service, and timely response to queries and concerns.
	Stay Updated on Industry Trends


Requirements


	Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Finance or a related field.
	4 - 5 years of experience in business development, marketing, or a related field, preferably in the financial services industry.
	Confident communicator with strong sales acumen.
	Proactive and passionate about business growth.
	Familiarity with financial products and services, including loan products and deposits.
	Ability to build and maintain relationships with clients and stakeholders.
	Analytical and problem-solving skills.


Salary
N350,000 / Month.

Method of Application

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Social Media Handler",
  "description": "Nettetal Nigeria Limited is an eclectic 21st century luxury company that has thrived for more than 30 years with expressions in three major states in Nigeria; Abuja, Lagos and Port Harcourt. They proudly hold the exclusive Nigeria franchise of KARE Germany and a vast clientele across different sectors in Nigeria and overseas. The company&#39;s major aim is to satisfy the luxury taste and price aspirations of their clients and stakeholders across board.

Nettetal has a track record of excellent customer service and satisfaction, integrity, adherence to world best practices and continuous development in its sector.
